description: This file is a shell script that configures system settings and resets certain parameters to default values, particularly related to network and device configuration, as well as self-healing features on a device. It sets parameters via 'dmcli' commands, modifies configuration files, and executes other shell scripts.

methods.name: _update_db_value
methods.description: A shell function that updates specific key values within the syscfg database file by setting certain parameters to zero.
